channel.title: ::object that adds objects
channel.description: I Need A Command ::object I Hope Someone Out There Can Help Me :D

item.title: ::object that adds objects
item.dc:creator: @gelert gelert
item.description:
@gelert wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:3, topic:329005”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("object") { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 2) int newObjectID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); CreateObj(absX, absY, newObjectID, 0, 10); // change CreateObj to whatever your creating object method is. }
Just made this real quick not sure if it will work or not.[/quote]
Wont work.

if (command.startsWith("object") && playerRights >= 3) { try { makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)), 1, 10); } catch(Exception e) { sM("Error Creating object."); } }
This should work on a delta

Read full topic

item.title: ::object that adds objects
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:3, topic:329005”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("object") { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 2) int newObjectID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); CreateObj(absX, absY, newObjectID, 0, 10); // change CreateObj to whatever your creating object method is. }

Just made this real quick not sure if it will work or not.[/quote]

^ No

if(command.startsWith("object") && playerRights >= 2) {
int id = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7));
makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, id, 0, 10);
}

Read full topic
